summary: In a turn-of-the-century Renaissance Italian mansion, its tyrannical owner, a one-handed, wheelchair-bound pianist, with a strong belief in the occult, is murdered.
cast: Robert Alda|Andrea King|Peter Lorre|Victor Francen|J. Carrol Naish|Charles Dingle|John Alvin|David Hoffman|Barbara Brown|Patricia Barry|William Edmunds|Belle Mitchell|Ray Walker|Pedro de Cordoba|Victor Aller|Symona Boniface|Gino Corrado|Franco Corsaro|Antonio Filauri|Joseph Marievsky|Edna Morris|Richard Neill|Paul Ravel|Suzanne Ridgway|Count Stefenelli|Ellinor Vanderveer|Catherine Wallace|Lottie Williams
title: La bestia con cinco dedos
